quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Boy and World
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, cisco, appearance. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: What relation is Morgan to Cory on the show Boy Meets World?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: his sister

questions.question: What was the name of the girl Shawn fell in love with, in the later episodes of Boy Meets World?
What was the name of the restaurant Cory and his friends would hang out at, on the show Boy Meets World?
Which of these famous actresses makes a guest appearance on the show Boy Meets World?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Jennifer Love Hewitt

questions.question: Did Cory Matthews ever get married on the show Boy Meets World?
The character of Shawn Hunter, on the show Boy Meets World,  had a brother.
In The Cisco Kid episode titled The Will, one of the bad guys henchmen is named for the state where he came from. What was his name?
What outrageous colour did Cory paint his apartment, causing Topangas disapproval, on one episode of the show Boy Meets World?
On the show Boy Meets World, who is the character George Feeny?

options.text: All of the answers are correct
Husband to the Dean at Corys college

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: All of the answers are correct

questions.question: On the show Boy Meets World, Cornelius is Corys real first name.
On the hit comedy Boy Meets World, Cory Matthews was played by Ben Savage who is the brother of the star of this TV show.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Wonder Years

questions.question: In the TV show, Sailor Moon, Sailor Moons cat can only talk to other cats.
What was the name of Panchos horse in the TV series The Cisco Kid?
What is Sailor Moons weapon during battle?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: a wand

questions.question: For how many seasons did the show Boy Meets World air?

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Xena and Series
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, god/goddess, princess. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: In the Xena TV series, Xena must rescue Hades sister Cyrene, the embodiment of Death, from King Sisyphus or all mankind will be doomed to eternal life filled with suffering.

In the TV series Xena: Warrior Princess, Baby Bliss, Cupids son, stole his fathers bow and wreaked havoc at the temple of the Hestian Virgins. Xena fell in love with Draco, Gabrielle with Joxer and Draco with Gabrielle.
In the TV series Xena: Warrior Princess, which Dream God kidnapped Gabrielle, forcing Xena to rescue her from the Dreamscape?
In the episode The Furies, Xena, the Warrior Princess convinced the Furies that Ares was her father.
Which God/Goddess from the TV series Xena: Warrior Princess seemed to have a special place in their heart for Gabrielle?
Which God did Xena have to deal with during the episode, titled Ulysses?
In the anime series, Prince of Tennis, who is Echizens last opponent during the National Tournament?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Kintarou Tooyama

questions.question: What is the colour of of the strange artifact that Griffith possesses in the anime series Berserk?
Which two Gods in Xena: Warrior Princess lost their powers and were stuck traveling with Gabrielle and Joxer until a solution was found in the episode The Quill is Mightier?
In Saiunkoku Monogatari, who is the consort and tutor to the young emperor, Shi Ryuuki?
What does the term Mad Men stand for according to the self-titled TV show?

options.text: Men who work for Mad Magazine

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Madison Avenue Advertising men

questions.question: Though Ares was first introduced in the Hercules: The Legendary Journeys series, he was not given a real face until he was introduced in Xena: Warrior Princess.
Xena, the Warrior Princess began her quest to eliminate the Gods because they threatened the life of her baby, Eve.
Which God/Goddess took over as King/Queen of the Gods when Zeus was killed in the TV series Xena: Warrior Princess?
Listen to the sound clip and guess the name of the anime series.

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Terry Jones and Anime
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, douglas, kamichama. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: Which of these films was not directed by Terry Jones?

options.text: And Now for Something Completely Different

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: And Now for Something Completely Different

questions.question: Terry Jones once said that Ireland had only ever banned four films, and he had directed three of them.
In Ouran Highschool Host Club, Haruhi is confused for a boy.
Does the anime series Hanbun no Tsuki ga Noboru Sora center around two hospitalizad teenagers.
Terry Jones wrote the novel Douglas Adamss Starship Titanic, based on the computer game. Which of the following associated statements is true?

options.text: Terry Jones claimed to have written the entire book while in the nude.
Terry Jones wrote it because Adams was too busy developing the computer game.
Terry Jones was a voice actor for the game, playing the Parrot.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: All statements are true.

questions.question: Did Lelouch Lamperouge promise to destroy the Britannian empire in the anime series Code Geass?
According to the anime series, La Corda Doro, how do you express your love?

options.text: by giving them what they want in life
by letting your love hear your music
by simply telling them you love them

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: by letting your love hear your music

questions.question: Terry Jones wrote and directed the film Erik the Viking, whose plot is markedly different from his earlier childrens book The Saga of Erik the Viking.
Terry Jones has co-written and presented several historical documentary series. Which of the following is not one of them?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Normans

questions.question: Terry Jones studied English at university, and one of his earliest books was an academic study centred on this famous Emglish writer.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Geoffrey Chaucer

questions.question: Who is Akanes close friend in the anime Harukanaru Toki no Naka de Hachiyoushou?
Terry Jones collaborated with Michael Palin at university and subsequently on many television shows.  Which of the following was not one of them?

options.text: The Complete and Utter History of Britain

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: How to Irritate People

questions.question: In the 2nd season of Kamichama Karin, do the characters want to change their future?
In the anime series Black Cat, does Train Hearnet go back to Chronos?
Terry Jones has written and directed an opera.
